properties.description: Book room. We offer books to read or take home. We offer jigsaws. Always one on the table, come fit some pieces in. Jigsaws available to take home. Free tea/coffee and biscuits. Friendly volunteers. Laptop connected through the Wi-Fi, so you can surf the internet. Free Wi-Fi. Ladies, gents and disabled toilet available. Lots of information about what’s happening in the community centre.
properties.title: Egglescliffe community centre

properties.description: Our Community Grocery Cafe is open on Thursday mornings 10-12.30 providing a warm friendly space serving hot drinks (20p), scones (20p) and toast (20p). Soup/roll (50p) served from 11.30. All drinks come with free refills.

properties.description: Chair Yoga and Exercise - Cafe AMALA sessions, free for all to attend. Chair Yoga and Exercise is on Mondays 10:30-11:30 am, Cafe Sessions 2nd Monday of the month. If wishing to attend Chair Yoga and Exercise and it is your 1st session, please come along 10 mins early to register. Sessions are warm, friendly and welcome to all. Wheelchair and Mobility scooter friendly.

properties.description: We provide a range of community support groups throughout the week, all our groups are for adults only (18+). Come along for a cuppa and a chat in a warm, safe, friendly environment! Groups include: - The Place To Be: Weeknights, Monday - Friday, 5pm - 8pm. - Men's Group: Mondays and Fridays, 12pm - 3pm. - Art Group: Wednesdays, 10am - 12pm, 1pm - 3pm. - LGBT+ Group: Thursdays, 10am - 12pm. - Bereavement & Grief* (6-week course): Thursdays: 1:30pm - 3:30pm - Coffee Morning (Grief-related discussion group): Friday 10am - 12pm. - Healthier Me* (6-week course): Fridays 1:30pm - 3:30pm. *if you are interested in our 6-week wellbeing courses, please get in touch beforehand to book a place and find out the next start date.
